languages.text: "Благая цель не есть оправдание. Ничто не есть оправдание! Ничто не может послужить примирению со скверной!"
"A noble goal is no excuse. There can be no excuse! Nothing justifies making peace with corruption!"
languages.original_text: "Благая цель не есть оправдание. Ничто не есть оправдание! Ничто не может послужить примирению со скверной!"

traits.locale_text: "A noble goal is not an excuse. Nothing is an excuse! Nothing can be grounds for making peace with corruption!"
traits.speaker: Chorda

traits.locale_text: "A noble goal is not an excuse. Nothing is an excuse! Nothing can be grounds for making peace with corruption!"
traits.speaker: Chorda

traits.locale_text: "A noble goal is not an excuse. Nothing is an excuse! Nothing can be grounds for making peace with corruption!"
traits.speaker: Chorda

traits.locale_text: "A noble goal is not an excuse. Nothing is an excuse! Nothing can be grounds for making peace with corruption!"
traits.speaker: Chorda

traits.locale_text: "A noble goal is no excuse. There can be no excuse! Nothing justifies making peace with corruption!"
traits.speaker: Chorda

traits.locale_text: "A noble goal is no excuse. There can be no excuse! Nothing justifies making peace with corruption!"
traits.speaker: Chorda

languages.text: “崇高的目标不是借口，什么都不是借口！无论是什么原因，都不能成为与腐化和解的理由！”
languages.original_text: "A noble goal is no excuse. There can be no excuse! Nothing justifies making peace with corruption!"

traits.locale_text: “崇高的目标不是借口，什么都不是借口！无论是什么原因，都不能成为与腐化和解的理由！”
traits.speaker: Chorda

languages.text: 「寛大な目標だからというのは言い訳にはならない。言い訳など許されない！腐敗と和解する理由にはならない！」
languages.original_text: "A noble goal is no excuse. There can be no excuse! Nothing justifies making peace with corruption!"

traits.locale_text: 「寛大な目標だからというのは言い訳にはならない。言い訳など許されない！腐敗と和解する理由にはならない！」
traits.speaker: Chorda

languages.text: «Un objetivo noble no es excusa. ¡Nada es excusa! ¡Nada justifica aceptar la corrupción!».
languages.original_text: "A noble goal is no excuse. There can be no excuse! Nothing justifies making peace with corruption!"

traits.locale_text: «Un objetivo noble no es excusa. ¡Nada es excusa! ¡Nada puede ser motivo para hacer las paces con la corrupción!».
traits.speaker: Chorda

languages.text: "Ein hehres Ziel ist keine Entschuldigung. Es kann keine Entschuldigung geben! Nichts rechtfertigt es, Frieden mit der Verderbnis zu schließen!"
languages.original_text: "A noble goal is no excuse. There can be no excuse! Nothing justifies making peace with corruption!"

traits.locale_text: "Ein hehres Ziel ist keine Entschuldigung. Nichts ist eine Entschuldigung! Nichts kann Grund sein, Frieden mit der Verderbnis zu schließen!"
traits.speaker: Chorda

languages.text: « Une cause noble n'est pas une excuse. Il ne peut y avoir aucune excuse ! Rien ne justifie que l'on cède à la corruption ! »
languages.original_text: "A noble goal is no excuse. There can be no excuse! Nothing justifies making peace with corruption!"

traits.locale_text: « Une cause noble n'est pas une excuse. Il n'y a aucune excuse ! Rien ne justifie que l'on cède à la corruption ! »
traits.speaker: Chorda

languages.text: "Asil bir amaç, bahane olamaz. Bunun bahanesi olamaz! Yozlaşmışlıkla barışık olmanın haklı bir sebebi olamaz!"
languages.original_text: "A noble goal is no excuse. There can be no excuse! Nothing justifies making peace with corruption!"

traits.locale_text: "Asil bir amaç bir bahane değil. Bunun bahanesi olamaz! Yozlaşmışlıkla barışık olmanın haklı bir sebebi olamaz!"
traits.speaker: Chorda
